content.description: BIRTH RATES AND DEATH RATES IN SELECTED COUNTRIES
content.question: Birth Rate (per 1,000 population) Death Rate (per 1,000 population) France 12 9 Mexico 20 5 India 21 7 Egypt 30 7 Nigeria 39 13 Source: Population Reference Bureau Which of the following best describes a spatial pattern suggested by the data shown in the table?

choices.label: Mexico and Nigeria have similar birth rates
India and Egypt have the lowest death rates
France and India have the lowest birth rates
Mexico and France have the highest death rates
Egypt and Nigeria have the highest birth rates

content.answer: Egypt and Nigeria have the highest birth rates

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe spatial patterns presented in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data.
